idea-plugin.name: SecretSpec Integration
idea-plugin.description:
Universal SecretSpec Integration plugin for all IntelliJ-based IDEs with per-configuration settings.
Features: - 🎯 Per-run-configuration SecretSpec settings (no more global settings!) - 🔧 Configure different profiles and providers for different run configurations - 🚀 Automatically prepends 'secretspec run --' to ANY run/debug command - 📋 Settings UI integrated directly into run configuration dialogs - 🌍 Works with Java, Go, Python, Node.js, and ANY application type - ✨ Universal compatibility with IntelliJ IDEA, GoLand, WebStorm, PyCharm, and all JetBrains IDEs - 🎨 Language-agnostic: works regardless of programming language or framework
idea-plugin.change-notes: 1.2.1 - 🎯 Per-run-configuration settings! Each run configuration can now have its own SecretSpec profile and provider settings.
